title: Sherlock: The Abominable Bride (Trailer #2) Masterpiece
text: What a life those gentlemen lead! Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John Watson return in Sherlock: The Abominable Bride, airing Friday, Jan. 1, 2016, 9pm ET only on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #SherlockPBS
